author: mandrigin
content:
And I've created a new issue in our GitHub repo to make an official glossary of Stateless Ethereum: https://github.com/ethereum/stateless-ethereum-specs/issues/44

I'm planning to try to get some rough draft within next 1-2 weeks. I feel that it is important that people know what exactly do we mean when we talk about witnesses, code merkelization, semi-stateless.

I believe it would be very helpful to both onboard new people into this idea and to make our own communication more concise and productive.
